Record Consent - Post-Counseling. Intended in bulk

link

name: consent-post-counseling
description: Record Consent - Post-Counseling. Intended in bulk

extension.valueMarkdown: Consent can be recorded based on a post counseling based on a blanket jurisdictional policy for Pilgrims as part of their permission to go on Hajj against a list of Pilgrim IDs of those that went through the health assessment check.
The OCHIE shall support create and update per the  [IHE PCF Consent Recorder Capability Statement](https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/PCF/CapabilityStatement-IHE.PCF.consentRecorder.html).
The OCHIE SHALL act as  [IHE PCF Consent Recorder](https://profiles.ihe.net/ITI/PCF/volume-1.html#153111-consent-recorder)
